# St Theodore's Institute

> Classical Christian Education in the Liberal Arts Tradition



Kitsaplabs.com is an LOB (Line of Business) of Prompt Neurons, LLC, providing webhost reseller services internally to other business units.

## Websites Managed

- [St Theodore's Institute](https://sti.kitsaplabs.com): St. Theodore's Insitute training site
- [Owncloud File Sharing](https://purl.org/sanddollar/share): Redirects to STI and is used for hosting files here

## Docs
- [Documentation Index](https://sti.kitsaplabs.com/index/llms.txt)
